title: Jazmine Sullivan unspools her 'Heaux Tales,' NPR Music's album of the year
description: The singer reveals the stories and inspiration behind her breathtaking album. Released in January, Heaux Tales held our gaze throughout the year, becoming NPR Music's pick for the best album of 2021.
